name: OneLife (Ticamad)
description:
Multi-Player Platformer, all sharing one objective, and one life. To complete each level, you have to ensure that all players, although moving synchronized, do not die. Use platforming combinations to reach places you normally couldn't do alone.

Alt: Download zip file, unzip "OneLife.zip" & play OneLife.exe (Recommended)

Controls:

Move: AD

 Jump: Space

Show entire Level: F

Restart Level: R

Menu ESC (Or press button top right)

Sounds provided by https://www.zapsplat.com/
